data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: There are two adult men sitting on a huge beam made of steel. Both of them wear hard hats, which indicates that they are on a construction site. One of them is wearing a blue T-shirt and making a phone call while looking at the tall building behind him. The other one is wearing a T-shirt with blue and white stripes and a pair of white trousers, and he is looking in the opposite direction. In front of them, there is a scaffolding in place to increase the safety of work performed at an elevated height, which is, by law, the standard approach taken in any construction site. (108字)
